intro1_message: Welcome to your first destination for job searching!
intro1_subMess: We're happy to have you! Let us assist you in finding a job that meets your aspirations
intro2_mess: Easily and quickly find the jobs that suit you
intro2_subMess: Looking for something specific? Use the custom search feature to find jobs that precisely match your skills and requirements. We are here to make your job search more focused and effective
intro3_mess: Are you a person who likes to work in a team and an external work environment?
intro3_subMess: Start a new journey in the world of work with a team that encourages innovation and continuous growth. Discover the opportunities that meet your aspirations now
intro4_message: Are you a person who likes to stay at home?
intro4_subMess: Working from home means more productivity and comfort, Apply now for remote jobs and take control of your time
quesNone: Do not to select a Job that interests you?

atLasteOnePostion: Please select at least one position.
